name: Reploid Zero Warrior
description:
Also available on Itch.io and Gamejolt ! PC/Joystick
The legendary warrior has come to.
A new challenge with a totally new 3D perspective and hack and slash Gameplay.
Trainning your skills and concentration to beat the Hard Level.

Features:
-Full Action Singleplayer Gameplay
-Powerfull Sword Combos. (Press Sword Button touch )
-3 Difficult Levels
-Tough Enemy AI.
-Blocking Attacks. (Press Shield Button touch)
-Dash Movement:
-Ending finishing Hard Level.

Enjoy! Hack'n'Slash!
